summary: DASH. CRACKED ON DRIVERS SIDE AND ALSO PASSENGER SIDE.  THEN A LARGER CRACKED APPEARED GOING HIGHER UP OVER THE CONTROL PANEL.  THE YEAR AFTER WE PURCHASED THIS VEHICLE NEW, WE KEPT HEARING A RATTLE.  AS TIME WENT ON THE NOISE INCREASED AND THE HAIRLINE CRACK BECAME LARGER.  WE HAVE HAD TO INSERT A FOAM PIECE TO CONTROL THE RATTLELING.  OUR SO. HAS A 2010 CHEVY TAHOE AND HAS THE SAME ISSUE
